page.title: 02LIFE STYLES KIRKBY FLEETHAM
page.content: OUR GROUP STUDIED LIFE STYLES IN KIRKBY FLEETHAM GREAT AND LITTLE FENCOTE THERE ARE 24 COUNCIL HOUSES AND BUNGALOWS,4 RENTED HOUSES THE REST ARE PRIVATELY OWNED.HOUSES ARE MOST POPULAR-THERE ARE ONLY 16 BUNGALOWS IN KIRKBY FLEETHAM AND 10 IN FENCOTE ONLY 3 CHILDREN HAVE TO SHARE A BEDROOM. 6 PEOPLE IN FENCOTE AND 8 IN KIRKBY FLEETHAM HAVE PAID HELP TO DO THE HOUSEWORK. 8 FAMILIES IN THE VILLAGES HAVE 2 CARS. 20 FAMILIES GO ON HOLIDAY REGULARLY. VERY FEW FAMILIES EAT OUT BUT HOME ENTERTAINING IS POPULAR. MOST PEOPLE HAVE A TELEVISION AND A TELEPHONE. 8 PEOPLE ATTEND CHURCH AND 14 CHILDREN REGULARLY ATTEND SUNDAY SCHOOL.
